body_html:
I do have an initial change that adds *some* determinism for the state dropout, but it's not easy to add such behavior for the input or output dropouts. It may be worth using the stateless random ops for dropout (optionally), but for that I would probably request we create a StatelessDropoutWrapper in contrib. PRs are welcome in this case!
…

body:
I do have an initial change that adds *some* determinism for the state
dropout, but it's not easy to add such behavior for the input or output
dropouts.  It may be worth using the stateless random ops for dropout
(optionally), but for that I would probably request we create a
StatelessDropoutWrapper in contrib.  PRs are welcome in this case!
